t: Amazon Has an Office in Former De Koepel Prison in the Netherlands - Business Insider
s: November 13, 2023 - In 2022, Amazon opened office space in de Koepel, a former prison in Haarlem, the Netherlands. The prison, which is built in a panopticon design, was active from 1901 to 2016. Haarlem has converted de Koepel into a community space, including space for tech companies.
